de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.parser
Class ReferenceGrammar

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.parser.ReferenceGrammar

public final class ReferenceGrammar
extends Object

Defines a immutable reference grammar. thus the reference grammar does not change on runtime it is a shared object.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
